'''"Tupayo's Aid"''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''.

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Burning-Aflame Wayob Manifestation|text="Tupayo's Aid" — Will of Honor and Glory}} while completing challenge conditions.
